explanation: [0-0] A man in a dark grey T-shirt is in a room, looking upwards with his mouth slightly open. The room has brown flooring and beige walls, and there are green plants.

[0-8] The man in the grey T-shirt waves his hand to the left. Then, the scene switches, and the man changes into a pink T-shirt and wears a black fake beard. Then the man in the grey T-shirt excitedly raises his hands, holding white boxing gloves, his mouth open and smiling. The camera switches back to the scene of the man wearing a fake beard, holding boxing gloves in both hands, with a serious expression, shaking a finger, and handing a dark brown clarinet to the man in the grey T-shirt. The man in grey looks at the clarinet in his hand with an unhappy expression.
